subject: Can i send a mail using junit
msgSnippet: Hi, I want to send a mail saying that the junit test suite has passed or not .Can i do it . I know we can use java to do this ,but still need some directions
messageBody:
Hi,
I want to send a mail saying that the junit test suite has passed or
not .Can i do it .
I know we can use java to do this ,but still need some directions on
this.
Can any1 plz help
Thanks in advance,
Say
